name: Potato Plunge
description:
In this 2d platformer game you play as a potato and you have to escape the cave, which is full of obstacles. Every time you die, another potato spawns and you have to start all over again. You need good control over the potato in order to pass all the tricky and hard obstacles. Will you be able to escape? 

If you beat this in hardcore mode you are a TRUE GAMER

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. in one week by me and my friend Juuhokki.

Most of this was made by me, Juuhokki made the potato and the musics.
